mapper.select: select a.*,c.flow,d.* from activity_base_info a inner join activity_rel_channel b on a.activity_id = b.activity_id inner join ooi_activity_flow c on a.activity_id = c.activity_id inner join ooi_base_channel_info d on b.channel_id = d.channel_id where DATE_FORMAT(a.end_time, '%Y%m%d') = #{activityEndDate} and c.flow in (2, 3)

select a.*,b.iop_activity_id,c.activity_name,c.start_time,c.end_time,d.* from ooi_MARKING_CAMPAIGN_INFO a inner join ooi_iop_rel_activity_info b on a.campaign_id = b.ooi_campaign_id and a.activity_id = b.ooi_activity_id inner join activity_base_info c on b.iop_activity_id = c.activity_id inner join ooi_marking_campaign_offerbo_info d on a.campaign_id = d.campaign_id where b.data_state = 'U' and b.is_feedback = '2' and a.activity_id = #{activityId}

select a.*,b.iop_activity_id,c.activity_name,c.start_time,c.end_time,d.* from ooi_MARKING_CAMPAIGN_INFO a inner join ooi_iop_rel_activity_info b on a.campaign_id = b.ooi_campaign_id and a.activity_id = b.ooi_activity_id inner join activity_base_info c on b.iop_activity_id = c.activity_id inner join ooi_marking_campaign_offerbo_info d on a.campaign_id = d.campaign_id where b.data_state = 'U' and b.is_feedback = '2' and a.activity_id = #{activityId} and DATE_FORMAT(c.end_time, '%Y%m%d') >= #{activityEndDate}

select a.*,b.iop_activity_id,c.activity_name,c.start_time,c.end_time,d.* from ooi_MARKING_CAMPAIGN_INFO a inner join ooi_iop_rel_activity_info b on a.campaign_id = b.ooi_campaign_id and a.activity_id = b.ooi_activity_id inner join activity_base_info c on b.iop_activity_id = c.activity_id inner join ooi_marking_campaign_offerbo_info d on a.campaign_id = d.campaign_id where b.data_state = 'U' and b.is_feedback = '2' and a.activity_id = #{activityId} and DATE_FORMAT(c.end_time, '%Y%m%d') = #{campaignedEndTime}

select a.*,b.flow,d.* from activity_base_info a inner join ooi_activity_flow b on a.activity_id = b.activity_id inner join activity_rel_channel c on a.activity_id = c.activity_id inner join ooi_base_channel_info d on c.channel_id = d.channel_id where DATE_FORMAT(a.end_time, '%Y%m%d') = #{activityEndDate} and b.flow in (2, 3)

select * from ooi_MARKING_ACTIVITY_INFO a where DATE_FORMAT(activity_endtime, '%Y%m%d') = #{activityEndDate} and a.activity_id in (select distinct ooi_activity_id from ooi_iop_rel_activity_info where is_feedback = '2' and data_state = 'U')

select b.activity_id,b.channel_id,'1' as flow from ooi_iop_rel_activity_info a inner join (select a.*,max(a.channel_id) from activity_rel_channel a GROUP BY activity_id ORDER BY channel_id) b on a.iop_activity_id = b.activity_id where a.iop_activity_id not in (select activity_id from ooi_activity_flow)

select a.activity_id, a.channel_id,CASE b.is_syn WHEN 'U' THEN '2' ELSE '3' END as flow from (select a.*,max(a.channel_id) from activity_rel_channel a GROUP BY activity_id ORDER BY channel_id) a inner join base_channel b on a.channel_id = b.channel_id where a.activity_id not in (select activity_id from ooi_activity_flow)

select distinct iop_activity_id from ooi_iop_rel_activity_info a inner join activity_base_info b on a.iop_activity_id = b.activity_id where data_state = 'U' and is_feedback = '2' and ooi_activity_id = #{activityId}

select distinct a.activity_id, a.activity_name, a.activity_name as campaignName, b.ooi_campaign_id as campaignId, a.spetopic_id, b.iop_activity_id from ooi_marking_activity_info a inner join ooi_iop_rel_activity_info b on a.activity_id = b.ooi_activity_id inner join activity_base_info c on c.activity_id = b.iop_activity_id where DATE_FORMAT(activity_endtime, '%Y%m%d') = #{activityEndDate}

select distinct a.activity_id,a.activity_name,a.city_id as city,a.activity_id as iop_activity_id from activity_base_info a inner join ooi_activity_flow b on a.activity_id = b.activity_id where b.flow = '3' and DATE_FORMAT(a.end_time, '%Y%m%d') = #{activityEndDate}

select a.activity_id, a.start_time, a.activity_name, a.activity_name as campaign_name, a.activity_id as campaign_id, a.end_time, e.POSITIONID, e.CHANNELID, e.CHANNETYPE, e.CHANNELNAME, e.POSITIONID, e.POSITIONNAME, c.final_obj_user_amount, c.final_obj_table_name from activity_base_info a inner join ooi_activity_flow b on a.activity_id = b.activity_id inner join activity_obj_user c on a.activity_id = c.activity_id inner join activity_rel_channel_parameter d on a.activity_id = d.activity_id inner join marking_activity_iop_info e on d.value = e.POSITIONID INNER JOIN activity_syn_log f ON a.activity_id = f.activity_id where parameter = 'internet_base_pos_name' and f.upload_time IS NULL and a.end_time = #{activityEndDate}
select * from activity_rel_product where activity_id = #{activityId} limit 1
select b.activity_id,b.end_time from ooi_iop_rel_activity_info a inner join activity_base_info b on a.iop_activity_id = b.activity_id where a.ooi_activity_id = #{activityId}

select a.ooi_campaign_id, b.activity_id as jt_activity_id, e.activity_name as jt_activity_name, c.offer_code, c.offer_name, d.activity_name, d.activity_id from ooi_iop_rel_activity_info a left join ooi_marking_campaign_info b on a.ooi_activity_id = b.activity_id left join ooi_marking_campaign_offerbo_info c on c.campaign_id = a.ooi_campaign_id left join activity_base_info d on a.iop_activity_id = d.activity_id left join ooi_marking_activity_info e on e.activity_id = a.ooi_activity_id where a.ooi_activity_id = #{activityId} and b.activity_id is not null and c.offer_code is not null and d.activity_id is not null

select distinct a.iop_activity_id as activityId,'1' as processId from ooi_iop_rel_activity_info a left join activity_base_info b on a.iop_activity_id = b.activity_id where is_feedback = 2 and data_state = 'U' and #{month} = date_format(b.end_time, '%Y%m') and b.activity_id is not null

select distinct a.activity_id,'3' as processId from activity_base_info a left join activity_rel_channel b on a.activity_id = b.activity_id left join ooi_iop_rel_activity_info c on a.activity_id = c.iop_activity_id where date_format(a.end_time, '%Y%m') = #{month} and b.channel_id not in ('q07', 'q23') and b.activity_id is not null and c.iop_activity_id is null and a.is_deleted = 0 and a.is_paused = 0 and a.activity_state = 9

select distinct a.activity_id,'2' as processId from activity_base_info a left join activity_rel_channel b on a.activity_id = b.activity_id left join ooi_iop_rel_activity_info c on a.activity_id = c.iop_activity_id where date_format(a.end_time, '%Y%m') = #{month} and b.channel_id in ('q07', 'q23') and b.activity_id is not null and c.iop_activity_id is null and a.activity_state = 9 and a.is_deleted = 0 and a.is_paused = 0
select distinct prc_id,prc_name from activity_rel_product where activity_id = #{activityId} order by prc_id limit 1

select distinct a.ooi_campaign_id, b.activity_id as jt_activity_id, e.activity_name as jt_activity_name, c.offer_code, c.offer_name, d.activity_name, d.activity_id from ooi_iop_rel_activity_info a left join ooi_marking_campaign_info b on a.ooi_activity_id = b.activity_id left join ooi_marking_campaign_offerbo_info c on c.campaign_id = a.ooi_campaign_id left join (select f.* from activity_base_info f left join activity_rel_channel g on f.activity_id = g.activity_id where f.activity_id = #{activityId} order by g.channel_id limit 1) d on d.activity_id = a.iop_activity_id left join ooi_marking_activity_info e on a.ooi_activity_id = e.activity_id where a.iop_activity_id = #{activityId} and b.activity_id is not null and c.offer_code is not null and d.activity_id is not null order by c.offer_code limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into ooi_activity_upload_count (interface_id, upload_num, fail_num, upload_time, activity_time) values (#{interfaceId}, #{uploadNum}, #{failNum}, now(), #{activityTime})

insert into ooi_activity_upload_detail ( interface_id, activity_id, activity_type, fail_desc, fail_time, activity_time ) value
( #{item.interfaceId}, #{item.activityId}, #{item.activitytype}, #{item.failDesc}, now(), #{item.activityTime} )
mapper.select: select distinct a.ooi_activity_id as activity_id,'1' as processId from ooi_iop_rel_activity_info a left join ooi_marking_activity_info b on a.ooi_activity_id = b.activity_id where #{month} = date_format(b.activity_endtime, '%Y%m') and b.activity_id is not null
mapper.insert: insert into ooi_interface_rel_table (interface_id, table_name, file_name, data_time, step) values (#{interfaceId}, #{tableName}, #{fileName}, #{dataTime}, #{step})
mapper.select: select * from activity_rel_channel where activity_Id = #{activityId} ORDER BY channel_id limit 1

select * from activity_base_info a inner join activity_rel_channel b on a.activity_id = b.activity_id inner join ooi_activity_flow c on a.activity_id = c.activity_id where c.flow in ('2', '3') and date_format(a.end_time, '%Y%m') = #{month}
